Uses of Class
com.aeonium.javafx.behaviour.FXAbstractBehaviour

  • Packages that use FXAbstractBehaviour 
    Package Description
    com.aeonium.javafx.actions
    The main package, contains the abstract base classes of the FXActions framework and the FXActionManager.
    com.aeonium.javafx.behaviour
    Base classes for the behaviour part of the framework - this is merely the annotation, the default annotation handler and the base class for all custom behaviour implementations.

    • Uses of FXAbstractBehaviour in com.aeonium.javafx.actions

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends FXAbstractBehaviour>
      T      		 FXActionManager.getBehaviour(java.lang.Class<T> c)
      Default method to get an instance of a behaviour class.
      <T extends FXAbstractBehaviour>
      T      		 FXActionManager.getBehaviour(java.lang.Class<T> c, boolean isSingleton)
      Deprecated. 
      Experimental - needs to be moved to the aeFXBehaviour project.
